channel.title: Skill Cape problem
channel.description: Well I've been trying to figure this out for about a week now. I have had downloaded HiyaScape V1 ages ago and I got bored with it now I'm using that source again and fixing mending and adding things to it but I have not been able to change the level needed for some skill capes from 100 to 99 because level 99 is the last level. It might be an easy or difficult but does anyone know which file I should edit and where there. Thanks!

item.title: Skill Cape problem
item.dc:creator: @Mirdu Mirdu
item.description:
@Mirdu wrote:

Oh brilliant a little error in the handler I’ve got it done cheer’s fellas :D.
